statements.select: SELECT similar_diagram_search_id FROM t_similar_diagram_search WHERE status_cd = '01'
statements.update: UPDATE t_similar_diagram_search SET status_cd = #statusCd#, start_dt =#startDt#, end_dt = null, update_user_id = #updateUserId#, update_dt = NOW() WHERE similar_diagram_search_id = #similarDiagramSearchId#
UPDATE t_similar_diagram_search SET status_cd = #statusCd#, end_dt = #endDt#, update_user_id = #updateUserId#, update_dt = NOW() WHERE similar_diagram_search_id = #similarDiagramSearchId#
statements.statement: with parts_terminal as ( select g.similar_diagram_search_id , g.wire_list_pub_no_id , g.wh_parts_name , g.new_parts_cd , g.terminal_id , g.terminal_name , g.pin_no , g.wiring_diagram_id from ( select similar_diagram.similar_diagram_search_id , similar_diagram.wire_list_pub_no_id , term.terminal_id , parts.wh_parts_name , parts.new_parts_cd , term.terminal_name , term.pin_no , wirefig.wiring_diagram_id from t_similar_diagram_search similar_diagram inner join t_pub_no pubno on ( similar_diagram.pub_no = pubno.pub_no and similar_diagram.import_version = pubno.import_version ) inner join t_wiring_diagram wirefig on (pubno.pub_no_id = wirefig.pub_no_id and similar_diagram.fig_name = wirefig.fig_name) inner join t_parts parts on (parts.wiring_diagram_id = wirefig.wiring_diagram_id) inner join t_terminal term on (parts.parts_id = term.parts_id) where similar_diagram.similar_diagram_search_id = #search_id# ) g group by g.similar_diagram_search_id , g.wire_list_pub_no_id , g.terminal_id , g.wh_parts_name , g.new_parts_cd , g.terminal_name , g.pin_no , g.wiring_diagram_id ) , from_to as ( select row_number() over () as row_num , g.similar_diagram_search_id , g.wire_list_pub_no_id , g.wiring_diagram_id , g.wire_id , g.from_wh_parts_name , g.from_parts_code , g.from_terminal_name , g.from_pin_no , g.to_wh_parts_name , g.to_parts_code , g.to_terminal_name , g.to_pin_no , g.wire_color from ( select fromt.similar_diagram_search_id as similar_diagram_search_id , fromt.wire_list_pub_no_id as wire_list_pub_no_id , fromt.wiring_diagram_id , fromt.wire_id as wire_id , fromt.wh_parts_name as from_wh_parts_name , fromt.new_parts_cd as from_parts_code , fromt.terminal_name as from_terminal_name , fromt.pin_no as from_pin_no , tot.wh_parts_name as to_wh_parts_name , tot.new_parts_cd as to_parts_code , tot.terminal_name as to_terminal_name , tot.pin_no as to_pin_no , col.wire_color from ( ( select wire.wire_id , wire.from_terminal_id , pt.similar_diagram_search_id , pt.wire_list_pub_no_id , pt.wiring_diagram_id , pt.wh_parts_name , pt.new_parts_cd , pt.terminal_name , pt.pin_no from t_wire wire inner join parts_terminal pt on (wire.from_terminal_id = pt.terminal_id) ) fromt inner join ( select wire.wire_id , wire.to_terminal_id , pt.similar_diagram_search_id , pt.wire_list_pub_no_id , pt.wiring_diagram_id , pt.wh_parts_name , pt.new_parts_cd , pt.terminal_name , pt.pin_no from t_wire wire inner join parts_terminal pt on (wire.to_terminal_id = pt.terminal_id) ) tot on ( fromt.wire_id = tot.wire_id and fromt.similar_diagram_search_id = tot.similar_diagram_search_id and fromt.wire_list_pub_no_id = tot.wire_list_pub_no_id and fromt.wiring_diagram_id = tot.wiring_diagram_id ) inner join t_wire col on (fromt.wire_id = col.wire_id) ) ) g group by g.similar_diagram_search_id , g.wire_list_pub_no_id , g.wiring_diagram_id , g.wire_id , g.from_wh_parts_name , g.from_parts_code , g.from_terminal_name , g.from_pin_no , g.to_wh_parts_name , g.to_parts_code , g.to_terminal_name , g.to_pin_no , g.wire_color ) , line_info as ( select row_number() over () as row_num , g.similar_diagram_search_id , g.wire_list_pub_no_id , g.from_wh_parts_name , g.from_terminal_name , g.from_pin_no , g.from_parts_code , g.to_wh_parts_name , g.to_terminal_name , g.to_pin_no , g.to_parts_code , g.wire_color , g.wire_list_detail_id from ( select similar_diagram.similar_diagram_search_id , wiredetail.wire_list_pub_no_id , wiredetail.from_wh_parts_name , wiredetail.from_terminal_name , wiredetail.from_pin_no , wiredetail.from_parts_code , wiredetail.to_wh_parts_name , wiredetail.to_terminal_name , wiredetail.to_pin_no , wiredetail.to_parts_code , wiredetail.wire_color , wiredetail.wire_list_detail_id from t_similar_diagram_search similar_diagram inner join t_wire_list_pub_no wirepubno on (similar_diagram.wire_list_pub_no_id = wirepubno.wire_list_pub_no_id) inner join t_wire_list_detail wiredetail on (wirepubno.wire_list_pub_no_id = wiredetail.wire_list_pub_no_id) where similar_diagram.similar_diagram_search_id = #search_id# ) g group by g.similar_diagram_search_id , g.wire_list_pub_no_id , g.from_wh_parts_name , g.from_terminal_name , g.from_pin_no , g.from_parts_code , g.to_wh_parts_name , g.to_terminal_name , g.to_pin_no , g.to_parts_code , g.wire_color , g.wire_list_detail_id ) , similar_for as ( select ttt.old_row_num , ttt.info_row_num , ttt.similar_diagram_search_id , ttt.wire_id , ttt.wiring_diagram_id , ttt.wire_list_detail_id , 100 - ( ttt.from_parts_name_diff_point + ttt.from_pin_no_diff_point + ttt.from_terminal_name_diff_point + ttt .from_parts_code_diff_point + ttt.to_parts_name_diff_point + ttt.to_pin_no_diff_point + ttt.to_terminal_name_diff_point + ttt.to_parts_code_diff_point + ttt.wire_color_diff_point ) as similar_point , 0 as reverse_flg , ttt.from_parts_name_diff_flg , ttt.from_pin_no_diff_flg , ttt.from_terminal_name_diff_flg , ttt.from_parts_code_diff_flg , ttt.to_parts_name_diff_flg , ttt.to_pin_no_diff_flg , ttt.to_terminal_name_diff_flg , ttt.to_parts_code_diff_flg , ttt.wire_color_diff_flg from ( select tt.old_row_num , tt.info_row_num , tt.similar_diagram_search_id , tt.wire_id , tt.wire_list_detail_id , tt.wiring_diagram_id , tt.from_parts_name_diff_flg , tt.from_pin_no_diff_flg , tt.from_terminal_name_diff_flg , tt.from_parts_code_diff_flg , tt.to_parts_name_diff_flg , tt.to_pin_no_diff_flg , tt.to_terminal_name_diff_flg , tt.to_parts_code_diff_flg , tt.wire_color_diff_flg , case when from_parts_name_diff_flg != 1 then 0 else #from_parts_name_point# end as from_parts_name_diff_point , case when from_pin_no_diff_flg != 1 then 0 else #from_pin_no_point# end as from_pin_no_diff_point , case when from_terminal_name_diff_flg != 1 then 0 else #from_terminal_name_point# end as from_terminal_name_diff_point , case when from_parts_code_diff_flg != 1 then 0 else #from_parts_code_point# end as from_parts_code_diff_point , case when to_parts_name_diff_flg != 1 then 0 else #to_parts_name_point# end as to_parts_name_diff_point , case when to_pin_no_diff_flg != 1 then 0 else #to_pin_no_point# end as to_pin_no_diff_point , case when to_terminal_name_diff_flg != 1 then 0 else #to_terminal_name_point# end as to_terminal_name_diff_point , case when to_parts_code_diff_flg != 1 then 0 else #to_parts_code_point# end as to_parts_code_diff_point , case when wire_color_diff_flg != 1 then 0 else #color_point# end as wire_color_diff_point from ( select ft.row_num as old_row_num , line.row_num as info_row_num , line.similar_diagram_search_id , ft.wiring_diagram_id , ft.wire_id , line.wire_list_pub_no_id , line.wire_list_detail_id , case when regexp_split_to_array(line.from_wh_parts_name, ',') && regexp_split_to_array(ft.from_wh_parts_name, ',') then 0 else 1 end as from_parts_name_diff_flg , case when regexp_split_to_array(line.from_pin_no, ',') && regexp_split_to_array(ft.from_pin_no, ',') then 0 else 1 end as from_pin_no_diff_flg , case when regexp_split_to_array(line.from_terminal_name, ',') && regexp_split_to_array(ft.from_terminal_name, ',') then 0 else 1 end as from_terminal_name_diff_flg , case when regexp_split_to_array(line.from_parts_code, ',') && regexp_split_to_array(ft.from_parts_code, ',') then 0 else 1 end as from_parts_code_diff_flg , case when regexp_split_to_array(line.to_wh_parts_name, ',') && regexp_split_to_array(ft.to_wh_parts_name, ',') then 0 else 1 end as to_parts_name_diff_flg , case when regexp_split_to_array(line.to_pin_no, ',') && regexp_split_to_array(ft.to_pin_no, ',') then 0 else 1 end as to_pin_no_diff_flg , case when regexp_split_to_array(line.to_terminal_name, ',') && regexp_split_to_array(ft.to_terminal_name, ',') then 0 else 1 end as to_terminal_name_diff_flg , case when regexp_split_to_array(line.to_parts_code, ',') && regexp_split_to_array(ft.to_parts_code, ',') then 0 else 1 end as to_parts_code_diff_flg , case when regexp_split_to_array(line.wire_color, ',') && regexp_split_to_array(ft.wire_color, ',') then 0 else 1 end as wire_color_diff_flg from line_info line right outer join from_to ft on (line.similar_diagram_search_id = ft.similar_diagram_search_id) ) tt ) ttt ) , similar_rev as ( select ttt.old_row_num , ttt.info_row_num , ttt.similar_diagram_search_id , ttt.wire_id , ttt.wiring_diagram_id , ttt.wire_list_detail_id , 100 - ( ttt.from_parts_name_diff_point + ttt.from_pin_no_diff_point + ttt.from_terminal_name_diff_point + ttt .from_parts_code_diff_point + ttt.to_parts_name_diff_point + ttt.to_pin_no_diff_point + ttt.to_terminal_name_diff_point + ttt.to_parts_code_diff_point + ttt.wire_color_diff_point ) as similar_point , 1 as reverse_flg , ttt.from_parts_name_diff_flg , ttt.from_pin_no_diff_flg , ttt.from_terminal_name_diff_flg , ttt.from_parts_code_diff_flg , ttt.to_parts_name_diff_flg , ttt.to_pin_no_diff_flg , ttt.to_terminal_name_diff_flg , ttt.to_parts_code_diff_flg , ttt.wire_color_diff_flg from ( select tt.old_row_num , tt.info_row_num , tt.similar_diagram_search_id , tt.wire_id , tt.wire_list_detail_id , tt.wiring_diagram_id , tt.from_parts_name_diff_flg , tt.from_pin_no_diff_flg , tt.from_terminal_name_diff_flg , tt.from_parts_code_diff_flg , tt.to_parts_name_diff_flg , tt.to_pin_no_diff_flg , tt.to_terminal_name_diff_flg , tt.to_parts_code_diff_flg , tt.wire_color_diff_flg , case when from_parts_name_diff_flg != 1 then 0 else #from_parts_name_point# end as from_parts_name_diff_point , case when from_pin_no_diff_flg != 1 then 0 else #from_pin_no_point# end as from_pin_no_diff_point , case when from_terminal_name_diff_flg != 1 then 0 else #from_terminal_name_point# end as from_terminal_name_diff_point , case when from_parts_code_diff_flg != 1 then 0 else #from_parts_code_point# end as from_parts_code_diff_point , case when to_parts_name_diff_flg != 1 then 0 else #to_parts_name_point# end as to_parts_name_diff_point , case when to_pin_no_diff_flg != 1 then 0 else #to_pin_no_point# end as to_pin_no_diff_point , case when to_terminal_name_diff_flg != 1 then 0 else #to_terminal_name_point# end as to_terminal_name_diff_point , case when to_parts_code_diff_flg != 1 then 0 else #to_parts_code_point# end as to_parts_code_diff_point , case when wire_color_diff_flg != 1 then 0 else #color_point# end as wire_color_diff_point from ( select ft.row_num as old_row_num , line.row_num as info_row_num , line.similar_diagram_search_id , ft.wiring_diagram_id , ft.wire_id , line.wire_list_pub_no_id , line.wire_list_detail_id , case when regexp_split_to_array(line.from_wh_parts_name, ',') && regexp_split_to_array(ft.to_wh_parts_name, ',') then 0 else 1 end as from_parts_name_diff_flg , case when regexp_split_to_array(line.from_pin_no, ',') && regexp_split_to_array(ft.to_pin_no, ',') then 0 else 1 end as from_pin_no_diff_flg , case when regexp_split_to_array(line.from_terminal_name, ',') && regexp_split_to_array(ft.to_terminal_name, ',') then 0 else 1 end as from_terminal_name_diff_flg , case when regexp_split_to_array(line.from_parts_code, ',') && regexp_split_to_array(ft.to_parts_code, ',') then 0 else 1 end as from_parts_code_diff_flg , case when regexp_split_to_array(line.to_wh_parts_name, ',') && regexp_split_to_array(ft.from_wh_parts_name, ',') then 0 else 1 end as to_parts_name_diff_flg , case when regexp_split_to_array(line.to_pin_no, ',') && regexp_split_to_array(ft.from_pin_no, ',') then 0 else 1 end as to_pin_no_diff_flg , case when regexp_split_to_array(line.to_terminal_name, ',') && regexp_split_to_array(ft.from_terminal_name, ',') then 0 else 1 end as to_terminal_name_diff_flg , case when regexp_split_to_array(line.to_parts_code, ',') && regexp_split_to_array(ft.from_parts_code, ',') then 0 else 1 end as to_parts_code_diff_flg , case when regexp_split_to_array(line.wire_color, ',') && regexp_split_to_array(ft.wire_color, ',') then 0 else 1 end as wire_color_diff_flg from line_info line right outer join from_to ft on (line.similar_diagram_search_id = ft.similar_diagram_search_id) ) tt ) ttt ) , similar_ext as ( select forw.old_row_num , forw.info_row_num , forw.similar_diagram_search_id , forw.wire_id , forw.wiring_diagram_id , forw.wire_list_detail_id , case when forw.similar_point > res.similar_point then forw.similar_point else res.similar_point end as similar_point , case when forw.similar_point > res.similar_point then forw.reverse_flg else res.reverse_flg end as reverse_flg , case when forw.similar_point > res.similar_point then forw.from_parts_name_diff_flg else res.from_parts_name_diff_flg end as from_parts_name_diff_flg , case when forw.similar_point > res.similar_point then forw.from_pin_no_diff_flg else res.from_pin_no_diff_flg end as from_pin_no_diff_flg , case when forw.similar_point > res.similar_point then forw.from_terminal_name_diff_flg else res.from_terminal_name_diff_flg end as from_terminal_name_diff_flg , case when forw.similar_point > res.similar_point then forw.from_parts_code_diff_flg else res.from_parts_code_diff_flg end as from_parts_code_diff_flg , case when forw.similar_point > res.similar_point then forw.to_parts_name_diff_flg else res.to_parts_name_diff_flg end as to_parts_name_diff_flg , case when forw.similar_point > res.similar_point then forw.to_pin_no_diff_flg else res.to_pin_no_diff_flg end as to_pin_no_diff_flg , case when forw.similar_point > res.similar_point then forw.to_terminal_name_diff_flg else res.to_terminal_name_diff_flg end as to_terminal_name_diff_flg , case when forw.similar_point > res.similar_point then forw.to_parts_code_diff_flg else res.to_parts_code_diff_flg end as to_parts_code_diff_flg , case when forw.similar_point > res.similar_point then forw.wire_color_diff_flg else res.wire_color_diff_flg end as wire_color_diff_flg from similar_for forw left outer join similar_rev res on (forw.old_row_num = res.old_row_num and forw.info_row_num = res.info_row_num) ) insert into t_similar_calc ( similar_diagram_search_id , wire_id , wire_list_detail_id , similar_point , reverse_flg , from_parts_name_diff_flg , from_pin_no_diff_flg , from_terminal_name_diff_flg , from_parts_code_diff_flg , to_parts_name_diff_flg , to_pin_no_diff_flg , to_terminal_name_diff_flg , to_parts_code_diff_flg , wire_color_diff_flg , insert_user_id , insert_dt , update_user_id , update_dt ) select similar_diagram_search_id , wire_id , wire_list_detail_id , similar_point , reverse_flg , from_parts_name_diff_flg , from_pin_no_diff_flg , from_terminal_name_diff_flg , from_parts_code_diff_flg , to_parts_name_diff_flg , to_pin_no_diff_flg , to_terminal_name_diff_flg , to_parts_code_diff_flg , wire_color_diff_flg , null as insert_user_id , now() as insert_dt , null as update_user_id , now() as update_dt from similar_ext where similar_point >= #min_point#

with search_result as ( select t.similar_diagram_search_id , t.wire_list_pub_no_id , t.pub_no , t.import_version , t.fig_name , sum(t.similar_point) as similar_point , round(sum(t.similar_point) / count(t.similar_point) / 100 * 100, 2) as similar_percent from ( select similar_diagram.similar_diagram_search_id , similar_diagram.wire_list_pub_no_id , similar_diagram.pub_no , similar_diagram.import_version , similar_diagram.fig_name , calc.similar_point from t_similar_diagram_search similar_diagram inner join t_wire_list_detail detail on ( similar_diagram.wire_list_pub_no_id = detail.wire_list_pub_no_id ) inner join t_similar_calc calc on ( calc.similar_diagram_search_id = similar_diagram.similar_diagram_search_id and calc.wire_list_detail_id = detail.wire_list_detail_id ) where similar_diagram.similar_diagram_search_id = #similarDiagramSearchId# ) t group by t.similar_diagram_search_id , t.wire_list_pub_no_id , t.pub_no , t.import_version , t.fig_name ) update t_similar_diagram_search set status_cd = '03' , similar_point = rslt.similar_point , similar_percent = rslt.similar_percent , end_dt= now() , update_user_id = null , update_dt = now() from search_result rslt where t_similar_diagram_search.similar_diagram_search_id = rslt.similar_diagram_search_id and t_similar_diagram_search.wire_list_pub_no_id = rslt.wire_list_pub_no_id and t_similar_diagram_search.pub_no = rslt.pub_no and t_similar_diagram_search.import_version = rslt.import_version and t_similar_diagram_search.fig_name = rslt.fig_name
